title: Ticket #5888: SLOT1_USER does not work on Windows workers with only 1 slot
description:
From Gideon at SpaceX:

  Looks like initUserPrivWindows calls getMySlotName to retrieve STARTER_SLOT_NAME, but STARTER_SLOT_NAME is not set because the startd does not pass –slot-name when there is only one slot. The result is that it tries to look for _USER instead of SLOT1_USER. The initUserPriv for non-Windows defaults to “slot1” in that case. I worked around it by manually setting STARTER_SLOT_NAME in my config. It also works if I set _USER.
creator: blin
